data.actual_result: The error message is shown for all members.
data.expected_result: The error message should only be shown for the user for whom you've tried to change the nick.
data.short_description: Error message for nickname change not possible will be shown for all server members
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings - Open `Members` - Open any member - Try to change the nickname to a too long name (more than 32 chars) - Go to another member - Observe the error message there
